name: biomodels_search
description: Searches for computational biological models in the EBI BioModels database. Use this tool to find models related to specific biological processes, such as 'glycolysis' or 'apoptosis'.

action.description: The specific action to perform. Must be set to 'search_models'.

query.description: The search term to query the BioModels database. Example queries include pathway names ('glycolysis'), disease names, or other biological keywords.

limit.description: The maximum number of model results to return. The default is 10.

return_schema.description: A dictionary containing the search results, including the count and a list of matching models.

count.description: The number of models matching the search query.

models.description: A list of model objects containing summary information.

name.description: The name or title of the biological model.

format.description: The file format of the model, typically 'SBML'.

url.description: The URL to the model's page on the BioModels website.

name: biomodels_get_files
description: Retrieves the download link for a specific biological model from the BioModels database using its Model ID.

action.description: The specific action to perform. Must be set to 'get_model_files'.

model_id.description: The unique Model ID (e.g., 'BIOMD0000000469') for which to retrieve the download link.

return_schema.description: A dictionary containing the model ID and its download URL.

model_id.description: The BioModels ID of the requested model.

main_page.description: The URL to the main page of the model on the BioModels website.

download_url.description: The direct URL to download the model file (usually in SBML format).
